metadata.title: CVE-2023-1637 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: A flaw that boot CPU could be vulnerable for the speculative executionbehavior kind of attacks in the Linux kernel X86 CPU Power managementoptions functionality was found in the way user resuming CPU fromsuspend-to-RAM. A local user could use this flaw to potentially getunauthorized access to some memory of the CPU similar to the speculativeexecution behavior kind of attacks.
